name: The Crab's Epilogue
description:
A short melancholy vignette, told from the perspective of an aging crustacean. 
Arrow keys\swipe to move and advance text.

Intended soundtrack (original track composed for this game): 

I feel like crabs get a pretty poor deal when it comes to how people treat them; even otherwise empathetic people seem to totally switch off their compassion when it comes to a lot of sea creatures. I know this story is anthropomorphic, but in some small way I wanted to start working towards a more compassionate world for crabs by making this game. I hope you appreciate it! Please let me know your thoughts in the comments, I'd love to hear your feedback.

Playthrough length: 5 minutes
